name: Death Before the Bloom by Aluna

metadata.description: Death Before the Bloom is a collection of 111 unique snapshots of an evolving palace from my imagination. With each mint, fans collect a snapshot of a unique rendition of this immersive experience, and are invited to follow along as their particular space evolves to either match their snapshot or reveal alternative phases of this developing environment. Listen to “Future”, the final track on my upcoming album and enjoy a virtual experience inspired by the transformational effects of natural growth and mycelium.
metadata.name: Death Before the Bloom #1
